channel.title: CVE Feed for Akhtarujjaman Shuvo -- Bootstrap Shortcodes Ultimate
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Akhtarujjaman Shuvo -- Bootstrap Shortcodes Ultimate

item.title: CVE-2023-47851|2023-11-30T11:25:12.939Z -- akhtarujjaman%20shuvo -- bootstrap%20shortcodes%20ultimate
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Akhtarujjaman Shuvo Bootstrap Shortcodes Ultimate allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Bootstrap Shortcodes Ultimate: from n/a through 4.3.1.
